items.name: case failure
items.desc: A status indicating the decomposition was not able to be completed.

items.name: case nonPositiveDefinite
items.desc: A status indicating a non-positive-definite pivot value was calculated.

items.name: case singular
items.desc: A status indicating the resulting decomposition is not suitable for use in a subsequent system solve.

items.name: case success
items.desc: A status indicating the decomposition was performed successfully.
